originalText.text: Dr. David dynoff is without a doubt a 5 star doctor that cares about his patients very much. He would never give up on a patient in anyway shape or form. He would go above and beyond to make sure his patients pain levels are under control. I would highly recommend him to anyone!

text.text: Dr. David dynoff is without a doubt a 5 star doctor that cares about his patients very much. He would never give up on a patient in anyway shape or form. He would go above and beyond to make sure his patients pain levels are under control. I would highly recommend him to anyone!

originalText.text:
I've been a patient of Dr. Dynoff for several years and see him at the Murray Hill location.

He has always been professional and helpful answering any questions. I have never felt rushed in my visits. His assistant is very friendly and he also has another doctor he works with filling in on Tuesdays.

Dr. Dynoff is an avid athlete which I appreciate as I am a runner. He will never tell you just not to run if something is bothering you like so many other sports docs do.

He works to make sure you are pain free and treats the problem not just masks the symptoms. He doesn't push surgery on you.  He's a big supporter of pain blocks, prp, stem cell therapies and even uses them on himself.

One disclaimer is the wait. He is only at this location 1 day a week so there is almost always a wait to see him.  Most people learn this the hard way. Don't take off stars just because of a wait, when it happens at virtually all dr. offices.
